summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a wire transfer received by a brokerage account. It details the amount transferred and includes communication between associates at Deutsche Bank. The email emphasizes confidentiality and the nature of the trade execution information.

events.title: Wire Transfer Received
events.description: A wire transfer of $555,637.31 was received from JPM into the Jeepers brokerage account.

locations: 345 Park Avenue - 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: A wire transfer of $555,637.31 was received from JPM.
The wire was deposited into the Jeepers brokerage account.
The communication emphasizes confidentiality and the nature of the trade execution information.
